#################################################

Release Name:
Heavy.Weapon.(PopCap.Games)-WWW

Release Type: PC Game
Game: Heavy Weapon
Language: English
 
#################################################

System Requirements:
Processor: Pentium - 500MHz or better
RAM: 128MB
DirectX Version: 7.0 or above
Keyboard and Mouse: Supported
Operating System: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
	
#################################################

How to install:
1. Run Heavy Weapon_setup.exe
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

The Cold War is heating up fast! Take charge in your super-tank as you face a massive Russian assault. Use an incredible assortment of heavy artillery to blast away enemy tanks and planes - then fight your way to victory! What are you waiting for? Pull up your bootstraps and get into the action! Prepare yourself for shoot-'em-up arcade action at its finest!
